entry.title: The Little Prince
entry.summary:
[February 2018 - June 2018]
Course: Introduction to Web Design

The Little Prince is an interactive story website for children aged 13 and under. The project aims to design a digital version of a printed “choose users own adventure” book. The entire website was designed through three iterations process to explore how it can most effectively translate the book from physical to digital form.

entry.title: Spoon Pets
entry.summary:
[July 2018 - November 2018]
Course: Human-Computer Interaction

“Spoon Pets” is a conceptual interaction design of an application prototype that helps users develop productivity and overcome procrastination, therefore enables them to foster ethical behaviour. Spoon Pets is a mobile app that overcomes procrastination by allowing users to effectively manage their schedules and facilitating their use of the Pomodoro Technique to limit the use of mobile phones during their mission. Users can earn points by using the Pomodoro timer to complete tasks that can be used to raise virtual mobile pets. Whenever the points reach a certain amount, the app can donate a certain amount to non-profit organizations, allowing users to help stray animals in entertainment. The prototype was built by using Adobe suit and sketch.

entry.title: Anxiety Eliminator Game
entry.summary:
[July 2017 - November 2017]
Personal Happy Project

Anxiety Eliminator is an interactive & digital game prototype built by using the Unity and involve some form of physical interaction by using the Leap Motion and MakeyMakey. Players need to match the music and tap the schematic pattern in the game prototype. The player operates the digital game prototype mainly by their gestures activities or by hitting physical objects.

entry.title: BeUpStanding
entry.summary:
[July 2018 - November 2018]
Course: Design Computing Studio 3 - Build

“BeAppStanding” is an iOS mobile application to further help the target users to sit less and stand more. This application and physical prototype were development by using native platforms (Swift,Xcode). The key component of my responsibility is to consider how to enhance the user experience and design the data visualisation by using emotion design and interface usability. In terms of it, the system can improve the cognition of target audience.

entry.summary:
